name: Lo-Fi Beats To Find Objects To
name_original: Lo-Fi Beats To Find Objects To
description:
A bunch of animal villagers have lost their belongings within Salmon Woods! Help them find their belongings and return them back, while experiencing the atmosphere of a cute stylised woodland.

Created as part of Global Game Jam 2021, on the Radical Forge site.

Credits:

Mara McGreal - 3D Artist
Jak Barnes - Programmer
Alice Halley - Designer
Will Bedford - Music
Phoebe Shore - 2D Art
Bruce Slater - Shaders/Cheerleader
Harry Boam - Sounds
